original_title: World’s No. 1 stunt kite team to feature at Derana International Kite Festival
original_body_lines: The world’s number one stunt kite team, the Three Wind Kite Team from Wuhan, China, will take part in the Derana-Signal Colombo International Kite Festival.
The Kite Festival is scheduled to take place on August 24 at Galle Face Green.
The Three Wind Kite Team has also claimed the World Kite Championship title for three years consecutively.
